data.name: World of Warplanes -Meteor Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

Feel the speed and power on the first Allied jet fighter! This “Meteor” is ready to break into your Hangar and tear any enemy apart with the fire of four rapid-firing 20-mm autocannons!
The Gloster Meteor F. I has outstanding speed and optimal altitude performance for its Tier. If you need to intercept bombers the Meteor is the best choice for this task. If you need to help your allies over a remote sector, its jet engine will allow you to get to the place of fight very quickly! Additional equipment will make this aircraft even stronger.

DLC Content:

  • The Gloster Meteor F. I, British Tier VII fighter. The first jet fighter of the Royal Air Force is ready for service! Fight on the legendary aircraft, surprise your opponents with the ability to appear in the most unexpected places, use its effective weapons and high speed to dominate in the sky of World of Warplanes.
  • Hangar slot: allows you to put your warbird in the Hangar.
  • Fully trained pilot with 5 skill points.
  • X25 Incendiary Ammunition: maximizes chances of causing fire and increases chances of inflicting critical damage.
  • Engine Boost Mixture Injection System Period 2: allows you to make your boost even more effective.
  • Reinforced Airframe (Period 2): gives additional hit points to aircraft.
  • 2000 gold: will significantly expand in-game opportunities.

data.short_description: Feel the speed and power on the first Allied jet fighter! This “Meteor” is ready to break into your Hangar and tear any enemy apart with the fire of four rapid-firing 20-mm autocannons!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech*, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
